SELECT a.id, a.source_key, a.title, a.content, a.content_orig, a.tag_str, a.form_id, a.author_id, a.audio_path, a.rank, a.rank_baidu, a.rank_google, a.rank_bing, a.rank_sou360, b.author_name author, b.dyn_id, b.avatar FROM tl_kb_poetry a LEFT JOIN tl_kb_author b ON a.author_id = b.id WHERE 1=1
AND b.dyn_id=#{dynId}
AND a.form_id=#{poeFormId}
AND (a.title like '%${key}%' or a.content_orig like '%${key}%' or a.search_key like '%${key}%')
AND ifnull(a.tag_str,'') like '%${tagStr}%'
AND a.id IN(select item_value from sys_dict_item WHERE dict_id=#{bookId})
ORDER BY tag_str IS NOT NULL AND tag_str != '' DESC, rank DESC

SELECT a.* FROM tl_kb_poetry a left join tl_kb_author b on a.author_id=b.id WHERE 1=1
AND rank_baidu is null
AND rank_bing is null
AND rank_google is null
AND rank_sou360 is null
ORDER BY b.rec_index desc
